challenges.title: React Native Mobile App
challenges.description: Build a cross-platform mobile application using React Native.
appRequirements: Implement user authentication and authorization
Integrate with backend APIs for data retrieval and storage
Include push notifications and in-app messaging functionality
Implement offline data synchronization
Utilize device features like camera, location, and sensors
Design and implement a responsive UI/UX
Handle state management using Redux or similar library
Optimize performance for smooth app experience
Implement unit and integration tests for key features

challenges.title: Vue.js E-commerce Website
challenges.description: Create a responsive e-commerce website using Vue.js.
appRequirements: Implement product listing and details pages
Include user authentication and cart functionality
Integrate with payment gateway for secure transactions
Implement search and filtering functionality
Optimize SEO using server-side rendering (SSR)
Utilize Vuex for state management
Design and implement a visually appealing UI/UX
Handle internationalization (i18n) for multi-language support

challenges.title: Angular CRM Dashboard
challenges.description: Develop a CRM dashboard using Angular.
appRequirements: Implement user authentication and role-based access control
Integrate with backend APIs for data retrieval and manipulation
Design and implement various charts and data visualizations
Include advanced search and filtering options
Implement real-time updates using WebSockets
Optimize performance for handling large data sets
Handle responsive design for optimal mobile experience
Implement data caching and offline functionality
Ensure code modularity and maintainability
